name: morning after: wet work
description:
NOTE: this visual novel has sensual content. nothing explicit, only implied.

emma gets a call from someone while in the bathtub.

they've been meeting casually for a while now. she's getting fond of him too. emma can only wonder what tyler thinks on his end.

background ambience provided by richists on FreeSound.org.

-

made for the O2A2 Jam. tell me what you think! and if i missed something i should add in the warnings and such. i had quite some fun; might update it with new content soon :DD
